statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveyData;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSurveyData WHERE survey_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSurveyData WHERE survey_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, touchpoint, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSurveyData ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM CustomerSurveyData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_surveys > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveyData LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSurveyData WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY survey_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(survey_id) AS total_surveys FROM CustomerSurveyData GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_surveys DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSurveyData WHERE touchpoint = 'Email' OR touchpoint = 'Website';
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score, MIN(satisfaction_score) AS min_score, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score FROM CustomerSurveyData;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_id, survey_timestamp, satisfaction_score, touchpoint FROM customer_survey_data ORDER BY survey_timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_timestamp FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM customer_survey_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY survey_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score < 2;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, survey_timestamp FROM customer_survey_data WHERE survey_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_feedback >= 3 ORDER BY num_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT touchpoint_name, touchpoint_type FROM touchpoints ORDER BY touchpoint_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint_id, survey_date FROM customer_surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT funnel_stage, order_id, customer_id, touchpoint_id FROM sales_funnel WHERE funnel_stage = 'Prospect' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_surveys WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 8;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(survey_id) AS survey_count FROM customer_surveys GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint_name, touchpoint_type FROM customer_surveys JOIN touchpoints ON customer_surveys.touchpoint_id = touchpoints.touchpoint_id;
SELECT sales_rep_name, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM sales_funnel GROUP BY sales_rep_name ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE region='North';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM touchpoints WHERE description LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as num_surveys FROM surveys GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT survey_id, feedback, rating FROM surveys WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS survey_count FROM surveys GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT touchpoint_name, description FROM touchpoints WHERE touchpoint_name LIKE '%interaction%' ORDER BY touchpoint_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score >= 4;
SELECT feedback_type, feedback_description FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT touchpoint_type FROM touchpoints
SELECT customer_id, feedback_type, feedback_description FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT name, age, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY survey_date ASC
